title: Jax
body:
One of the most overpowered champions in this game, if not the most overpowered. He has been for the longest time. 

Jax can take on an entire team by himself. He scales absurdly. He has zero mana issues, with extremely low cooldowns. 

His damage is off the charts. He is extremely tanky. He has ridiculous mobility. 

What exactly is balanced about this champion? What about him can you even call a "weakness"? Of course, there is nothing. He is all benefits with zero drawbacks. 

As soon as the other team has a Jax, you know that you are going to lose. It is just that simple. Unless the Jax is a first-time player or wants to lose on purpose to troll his allies, there is absolutely nothing you can do to stop him. 

Nerf this bull shit and let the game be played. Games should not be won at the champion select screen.

replies.body: Let me guess. You just got rekt by Jax last game in 1 out of 1000 matches & starts QQ-ing about him here.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kGgQxv1f,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-23T03:38:02.033+0000)
>
> Let me guess. You just got rekt by Jax last game in 1 out of 1000 matches & starts QQ-ing about him here.

Nope. I got "rekt" by every single Jax I have played, and usually, there is one in at least every second game since everyone knows he is a free win. Bad guess.
Then the problem is you tbh.
Silver the past two seasons. I think the problem is definitely with you tbh. But thanks for your useless input.
Says a guy hiding behind a Level 19 account, and I'm not the one complaining about Jax, especially when you're insulting my outdated account.
my last game i played vs a jax.. and won..

Again, a bunch of first-time players who drag his average down does not prove jack. In the hands of an experienced player, he is a completely free and guaranteed win.
Plat and above are used for the stats...

his winrate top is 50%
in the jungle it is 51.58%

and next patch the items he normally gets are getting nerved...

> Jax

> One of the most overpowered champions in this game

Fucking what.

......Naw if you are smart you can cause most jax players to outplay themselves.  Maybe instead of pushing to turret with 0 vision of the river, you ward river and than run away when jax shows up?

Ive beaten alot of jax players.  It just takes smarts and to know what his kit is.

> [{quoted}](name=Law of John,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kGgQxv1f,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-23T03:41:13.138+0000)
>
> ......Naw if you are smart you can cause most jax players to outplay themselves.  Maybe instead of pushing to turret with 0 vision of the river, you ward river and than run away when jax shows up?
> 
> Ive beaten alot of jax players.  It just takes smarts and to know what his kit is.

Funny thing is, I was farming under tower. He was pushing my lane the whole time. He easily dived, tanked multiple tower hits, killed me and left. No sweat. Good luck to my jungler trying to gank him. He just dodges everything and hops away.

Jax is at a weird stance right now. I agree, he can beat a whole 4 players, ive seen it in multiple games. There are bad and good jaxes the good can beat 4 out have 5. He can jump and be invincible, stun you, silence. Hes annoying. Hes practically a slow fat fizz. I dont find him to be OP but i think his stun should be removed.{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
